price: "E não vos sublimeis em arrogância para com Allah. Por certo, eu vos chego com evidente comprovação."
arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-an lā taʿlū ʿalā al-lahi innī ātīkum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
